CustomField.description: For the current year, has this been formally budgeted as a project?
CustomField.inlineHelpText: For the current year, has this been formally budgeted as a project?
CustomField.label: CY Budget Status

value.fullName: It is approved for the current year budget.
value.label: It is approved for the current year budget.

value.fullName: It has been asked for as part of next year's budget.
value.label: It has been asked for as part of next year's budget.

value.fullName: They asked last year, but I don't know more.
value.label: They asked last year, but I don't know more.

value.fullName: They couldn't get it approved last year for this year.
value.label: They couldn't get it approved last year for this year.
